summary:
this is an edit on xp32's skeleton here http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/? I just don't like the default positions of the bow just lying flat on your back so I thought i'd share
<br /><br />just drop the data folder into your skyrim directory and that's it
descriptionHtml:
this is an edit on xp32's skeleton here [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/[/url]? I just don't like the default positions of the bow just lying flat on your back so I thought i'd share
<br /><br />just drop the data folder into your skyrim directory and that's it.. this if for all characters male, female, and beast. thanks xp32 your skeleton rocksÂ
author: voidout1968
